AmazonSDB::__construct ( $  key = null,
$  secret_key = null 
)

Constructor

Parameters:
string $key Your Amazon API Key. If blank, it will look for the AWS_KEY constant.
string $secret_key Your Amazon API Secret Key. If blank, it will look for the AWS_SECRET_KEY constant.
Returns:
bool FALSE if no valid values are set, otherwise true.

Example Usage:

<?php
require_once('tarzan.class.php');

/**
 * Instantiate a new AmazonSDB object using the settings from the config.inc.php file.
 */
$sdb = new AmazonSDB();


/**
 * Instantiate a new AmazonSDB object using these specific settings.
 */
$sdb = new AmazonSDB($key, $secret_key);


?>
